title: Polluted Water Body
description: The image depicts a polluted water body filled with various types of debris, including plastic bottles, pieces of wood, and other waste materials. The water appears dark and contaminated, with patches of green vegetation visible at the edges.

title: Pollution in Water Body
description: The image shows a pipe discharging yellow liquid into a body of water, creating ripples. The surrounding area features muddy banks and tall grasses, indicating a natural environment that is being affected by pollution.

title: Nuclear Power Plant
description: A view of a nuclear power plant situated near a body of water, surrounded by greenery. The plant features a large dome structure and several buildings, with cranes visible, indicating ongoing construction or maintenance. The landscape includes trees and open fields in the foreground, with a clear sky in the background.

title: Children Playing in a Rural Setting
description: The image depicts a group of children in a rural area. In the foreground, a young child is sitting on the ground, playing with water in a small puddle. Nearby, other children are engaged in various activities, with some appearing to be playing or exploring. The background shows a natural environment with trees and a makeshift structure, suggesting a simple, rural lifestyle.
